channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The best earbuds I recommend for every budget, all TechRadar tested
item.description: My carefully considered pick of the best earbuds in the business – including one or two new models you might not be familiar with.

item.title: Aluminium OS : le projet de Google pour rivaliser avec Windows, macOS et l’iPad
item.description: En coulisses, Google continue de travailler sur le rapprochement de ChromeOS et d'Android, un projet censé concurrencer les deux cadors du secteur — Windows et macOS — ainsi que l'iPad plus efficacement qu'avec la version actuelle de ChromeOS. Les pièces du puzzle commencent à se mettre en place.

item.title: I’ve tested 30 Bluetooth speakers this year, here are the only 5 Black Friday deals I’d buy
item.description: After testing more than 30 Bluetooth speakers this year, these are the 5 models I’d buy in the Black Friday sales.

item.title: Mise à jour Waze : la limitation la plus agaçante d’Android Auto disparaît
item.description: Google Maps le fait depuis 2023. Il aura fallu attendre fin 2025 pour que Waze se décide enfin. L'application GPS communautaire fait sauter son verrouillage d'écran lorsque vous êtes connecté à Android Auto. Une mise à jour silencieuse, mais qui change tout au quotidien.

item.title: Boulanger fait sa grande braderie pendant la Black Friday Week : les 16 offres qui méritent votre argent
item.description: Avec la Black Friday Week, une nouvelle vague de promotions a déferlé chez les grands sites de e-commerce. Pour l'occasion, Boulanger n’hésite pas à baisser les prix de nombreuses références Tech. Voici les offres qui valent le coup.

item.title: Du jamais vu dans l’histoire de l’humanité : une sonde va à entrer dans un territoire que seule notre imagination visitait
item.description: Le rendez-vous est fixé en novembre 2026. Voyager 1 aura alors mis presque 50 ans à accomplir ce que la lumière peut faire en seulement un jour ! La mission ira-t-elle au-delà ?

item.title: The Best Samsung Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From flagship and budget to flipping and folding, Samsung’s Galaxy range spans the breadth of the smartphone cosmos. WIRED’s here to help you make your choice.

item.title: You can save up to 44% on the Echo Spot in Amazon's Black Friday sale – get your new smart alarm clock while you can
item.description: Amazon's flagship smart alarm is almost half off this Black Friday, and it's become a fan-favorite.

item.title: Leaker claims Xbox Series X and Series S consoles could see another price hike due to global RAM shortage
item.description: Microsoft will reportedly have to increase the price of Xbox consoles yet again "very soon" due to a potential global RAM shortage.

item.title: Skyscanner Rolls Out a Triple Wave of Travel Deals for Black Friday, Cyber Monday, and Travel Tuesday
item.description: Visiting all your favorite destinations this holiday season doesn't have to put a dent in your wallet.

item.title: Aluminium OS will be Google’s take on Android for PC
item.description: We know a little more about Google’s long-gestating plans to combine the best parts of Android and ChromeOS into a single OS thanks to a job listing for a product manager to work on “Aluminium OS.” The job ad describes it as “a new operating system built with Artificial Intelligence (AI) at the core.” Android […]

item.title: Chrome sur Android change pour vous aider à retrouver vos sites préférés
item.description: Google va déployer sur la version Android de Chrome une fonction très appréciée sur PC. Le navigateur de Google va permettre à ses utilisateurs de ne jamais perdre de vue leurs sites préférés.

item.title: Google stock price is surging today as AI sets it up to become next $4 trillion giant. Here’s why
item.description: Boosted by rave reviews of Gemini 3 and a rumored chip deal with Meta, Alphabet is performing better than any tech giant in the Magnificent 7. Shares in Alphabet Inc (Nasdaq: GOOG), the company better known as Google, are rising again in premarket trading today.

item.title: Get $500 off a stunning HP Omen gaming laptop in Best Buy's Black Friday gaming sale
item.description: Best Buy's huge Black Friday sale includes massive discounts of up to $500 on HP gaming laptops and great discounts on HyperX peripherals – everything a budding gamer needs this November.

item.title: Watch out - that Amazon page offering amazing Black Friday deals could be a dodgy spoof site, and could leave you seriously out of pocket
item.description: Black Friday phishing attacks rise sharply, targeting unprepared shoppers with fake retailer sites, malicious emails, and rapidly scaled AI-driven scams.

item.title: Volvo prend une décision radicale pour ses voitures électriques et la conduite autonome
item.description: La firme suédoise Volvo annonce rompre son contrat avec Luminar, chargé de fournir le capteur LiDAR de ses voitures électriques. Une décision forte, qui risque de faire du mal à l’équipementier, déjà en mauvaise posture.

item.title: 9 Best Speakers for Kids (2025): Smart, Bluetooth, and Offline Speakers
item.description: Play music, audiobooks, and more for your children with one of these WIRED-tested gadgets.

item.title: Car influencers love Chinese EVs — and China loves them back
item.description: The first Chinese-made car Omar Rana ever drove was a gas-powered SUV that he rented while on a trip overseas in 2015. To say it didn't leave much of an impression would be an understatement. "It sucked really bad," Rana, aka OmarDrives, tells me. "A horrible experience." Flash forward nearly a decade to last year, […]

item.title: Dreame's stair-climbing, pet hair-sucking and floor-mopping robot vacuum just saw a major Black Friday discount
item.description: This stair-climbing, mopping and pet hair-busting robot vacuum should go straight in your shopping basket.

item.title: 16+ unmissable Black Friday floorcare deals from Shark, Tineco, and more
item.description: Clean up in the Black Friday sales with up to 50% off wet-dry vacuums, spot cleaners, and steam mops from leading brands.

item.title: I've tested more than a hundred laptops and this is the Black Friday deal I'd recommend: a huge $420 discount on the HP Omnibook X Flip
item.description: Save almost half off the HP Omnibook X Flip – this is a Black Friday laptop deal you won't want to miss.

item.title: The YouTube Music Recap for 2025 is rolling out now with new AI tricks – here's how to get it
item.description: If you're a YouTube Music user, you can now look up your most listened to tracks and artists.

item.title: La Black Friday Week des smartphones premium : de beaux prix cassés sur les téléphones d’Apple, Samsung, Google, Nothing…
item.description: La Black Friday Week bat son plein ! Les étals des e-commerçants ne désemplissent pas de réductions en tout genre. Nous avons rassemblé ici les meilleures offres disponibles pour les smartphones haut de gamme testés par Frandroid.

item.title: The best gaming PC in 2025: my top picks for all budgets and games
item.description: Looking to upgrade? I've carefully selected the best gaming PCs in 2025 based on budget, performance, design, and configurability.

item.title: My favorite Asus gaming laptop is almost up to 30% off in Black Friday deals – just in time to beat the RAM price crisis
item.description: At nearly 30% off in Black Friday deal, you'd do yourself a disservice not buying this Asus ROG gaming laptop, so don't miss it!

item.title: GrapheneOS quitte la France : pourquoi l’Android « anti-mouchards » claque la porte
item.description: C'est la rupture. Fin 2025, ce qui n'était qu'une niche pour passionnés de cybersécurité s'est transformé en affaire d'État. Accusé de faciliter le crime organisé par les autorités françaises, le projet GrapheneOS riposte en retirant ses infrastructures du territoire. Plongée au cœur d'une polémique où fantasmes techniques et volonté de surveillance s'affrontent violemment....

item.title: The best phone deal of Black Friday is still going strong: save $700 on Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7
item.description: Samsung has won Black Friday with this deal, and there's still plenty of time to grab it.

item.title: Ce laptop Dell 2-en-1 avec écran 2K + Ultra 5 profite d’une belle ristourne lors de la Black Friday Week
item.description: Si vous êtes en quête d'une machine qui brille de par sa polyvalence, nous avons la solution avec ce Dell 14 Plus 2-en-1. Son constructeur lui offre en plus une remise intéressante puisqu'il passe de 849 euros à 599 euros.

item.title: This Best Buy discount might be the best Black Friday gaming laptop deal so far – save $500 on the Asus TUF A16 with RTX 5070
item.description: Save $500 on an RTX 5070 laptop with this early Black Friday deal at Best Buy - one of the best gaming laptop discounts I've seen all year.

item.title: iOS 26 lets you banish a major annoyance in the Wallet app – here’s how to do it
item.description: Sick of receiving ad-related notifications from Apple’s Wallet app? There’s a quick way to disable them in iOS 26.

item.title: Huawei Mate 80 Pro Max has the world’s brightest phone screen
item.description: Huawei has just launched its Mate 80 series in China, and the top-spec 80 Pro Max stands out for a dual-layer OLED display that Huawei says can hit an unmatched 8,000 nits of peak brightness. The Mate 80 phones are joined by a new Mate X7 foldable with IP59 dustproofing. There are four Mate 80 […]

item.title: This Linux OS has got a million downloads since Windows 10 support ended – should Microsoft start worrying now?
item.description: Can't – or won't – upgrade to Windows 11? You're not alone, and one Linux distro is attracting a lot of attention since Windows 10 support ended.

item.title: I'm a serial iPhone case-buyer, and these are the best iPhone 17 cases I've tested
item.description: Our pick of the best cases for your iPhone 17, iPhone Air, iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max, based on style, resilience and versatility.

item.title: Cette RTX 5090 est la plus chère du monde et elle est déjà en rupture de stock
item.description: Une carte graphique à plus de 4000 euros, ça vous dit ? L'édition limitée de RTX 5090 par Asus est déjà en rupture de stock malgré son prix hors du commun.

item.title: Brace yourself, Spotify fans –another price hike is predicted to hit the US in early 2026
item.description: It looks like Spotify is going to bump up prices for its US subscribers again, but we don't know by how much.

item.title: The Fate of Earth Rests in Your Hands With Leeloo’s ‘Fifth Element’ Multi Pass
item.description: The key prop carried by Milla Jovovich's character in the 1997 sci-fi adventure is going up for auction.

item.title: The PS5 Pulse Elite headset and Pulse Explore earbuds are perfect for PS Portal players, and they're cheaper than ever for Black Friday
item.description: Upgrade your PS5 gaming with the PS Pulse Elite and PS Pulse Explore audio accessories. Perfect for PS Portal users with PS Link functionality.

item.title: Vague d’attaques contre Windows : les pirates ont 2 nouvelles tactiques pour propager des virus
item.description: Une nouvelle vague de cyberattaques cible les utilisateurs de Windows. Pour diffuser des virus voleurs de données, les pirates s'appuient sur deux variantes inédites de l'offensive ClickFix.

item.title: Gizmodo Senior Writer James Pero’s 8 Favorite Tech Gifts of 2025
item.description: Okay, one of these isn't a gadget or tech-related, but you're going to have to read to find out what it is.

item.title: He Hunted Alleged Groomers on Roblox. Then the Company Banned Him
item.description: YouTuber “Schlep" built a huge following tracking down alleged child predators on Roblox before being kicked off. The platform is facing multiple lawsuits over child safety.

item.title: LG UltraFine Evo 6K 32-inch Monitor Review: More Pixels, Please
item.description: One of the sharpest monitors ever made, the LG UltraFine Evo 6K monitor has more than just extra pixels to offer.

item.title: You won’t want to hide Ikea’s colorful new Bluetooth speakers
item.description: Ikea is launching two new Bluetooth speakers next month as part of a larger collection announced earlier this year, following the end of the company’s partnership with Sonos. Like the Blomprakt speaker lamp that launched in the US last month, both the new Solskydd and Kulglass speakers blend technology and design so they’ll function as […]

item.title: Large language mistake
item.description: "Developing superintelligence is now in sight," says Mark Zuckerberg, heralding the "creation and discovery of new things that aren't imaginable today." Powerful AI "may come as soon as 2026 [and will be] smarter than a Nobel Prize winner across most relevant fields," says Dario Amodei, offering the doubling of human lifespans or even "escape velocity" […]...

item.title: IKEA reveals 6 colorful new Bluetooth speakers and lamps to brighten up your mood and home
item.description: IKEA has announced more products made in partnership with designer Teklan, going on sale next month.

item.title: Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet is reportedly still years away from release, will be a no-show at The Game Awards and won't launch in 2026
item.description: Sources claim Naughty Dog's next game, Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet, won't be released in 2026 and is still years away.

item.title: The best Black Friday coffee maker deals: up to 60% off Breville, De'Longhi and Keurig, plus free coffee
